mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mostly Musical Theatre or Songs for the Misplaced Dreamer by Celeste Burnum
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the 1992 production Mostly Musical Theatre or Songs for the Misplaced Dreamer written by and starring Celeste Burnum. Producing Director: Rex Partington. Directed by Gary Robertson. Musical Direction and Arrangement by Ray Reach. Barter Resident Musical Director/Pianist: Logan Brown. Lighting Design by Tony Partington. Stage Manager: Jeffery Gillenwater. Assistant Stage Manager: Morrisa Harr. Special Effects by Polymusic, Inc., Birmingham. 1992 Season.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes. Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
